original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, posts as p, users as u WHERE ph.PostId = p.Id AND p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-17 21:24:11' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-26 19:26:37' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-22 14:43:39' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Reputation<=6524 AND u.Views>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-17 21:24:11'

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-26 19:26:37' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-22 14:43:39'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) >= 1 AND CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) <= 6524 AND users.Views >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E3.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E3.Id)
